subclusters.subcluster_name: SASP and Secretome-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
Immune Cell Senescence and Immune Aging Theory
Stem Cell Senescence and Epigenetic Regulation Theory

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and Secretome-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senescence-associated secretory phenotype (SASP) and exosomal non-coding RNAs as regulators of senescence and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and Secretome-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes SASP secretion, chronic inflammation, and senolytic interventions targeting secretory phenotype.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and Secretome-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights SASP-driven inflammaging and senolytic/anti-SASP compounds as therapeutic approaches.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and Secretome-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details SASP factor IGFBP5 mediating secondary senescence via paracrine signaling and nuclear receptor interaction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and Secretome-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on SASP chemokines (CXCR2 ligands) reinforcing senescence and promoting tissue dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and Secretome-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes SASP-driven adipose tissue inflammation and impaired clearance of senescent cells.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and Secretome-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses SASP effects in liver disease, including inflammation, fibrosis, and dual roles in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and Secretome-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights SASP secretion and chronic accumulation of senescent cells causing tissue dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and Secretome-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on SASP-driven inflammaging and molecular pathways linking oxidative stress to senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and Secretome-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes SASP secretion in skin aging and molecular pathways regulating senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and Secretome-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes SASP-mediated chronic inflammation and DNA damage response reinforcing senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and Secretome-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Comprehensive overview of SASP, senescence inducers, and their role in aging and pathology.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and Secretome-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on SASP promoting pro-inflammatory and tumorigenic microenvironment in aging tissues.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and Secretome-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details SASP secretion and major senescence pathways (p53/p21 and p16/RB) driving aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and Secretome-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights SASP heterogeneity, secretome effects, and causal role in organismal aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Senescence and Immune Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senescence of T lymphocytes, immune signaling pathways, and reversibility of senescence features.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Senescence and Immune Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes microglial senescence, impaired immune signaling, and neuroinflammation driving brain aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Senescence and Epigenetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on stem cell senescence, DNA damage response, epigenetic alterations, and regenerative decline.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Senescence and Epigenetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details aberrant chromatin remodeling by HIST1H1E mutations accelerating cellular senescence and premature aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Senescence and Epigenetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes epigenetic regulation of senescence, INK4a/ARF locus, and stress-induced premature senescence in kidney aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Senescence and Epigenetic Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Includes molecular pathways regulating senescence such as DNA damage response, mitochondrial dysfunction, and epigenetic changes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on oxidative stress as a driver of senescence, p53/p21 pathway activation, and age-related diseases.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes oxidative stress, redox control by non-coding RNAs, and SASP in senescence and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress-Induced Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on autophagy decline leading to accumulation of damaged components and oxidative stress driving aging.
